text: Anastasios Metaxas (, 27 February 1862 â€“ 28 January 1937) was a Greek architect and shooter. He won a bronze medal at the 1908 Summer Olympics in London. He was known for designing the Cathedral of Saint Andrew, Patras. ==References== Category:1862 births Category:1937 deaths Category:Architects Category:Olympians for Greece Category:Olympic bronze medalists Category:Sportspeople from Athens Category:Competitors at the 1908 Summer Olympics
